wikipedia_page.main: Lee Jarman (born 16 December 1977) is a former Welsh footballer.

response: Cardiff were drawn against Welshpool Town for their first match and a team made up of mostly youth players with a handful of reserves came away with a 1–0 win after youngster Jonathan Brown scored on his first team debut. Newport County were the club's opponents in the semi-final and despite adding several more of the more experienced reserve players to the side they were beaten on penalties. The match also saw a number of former Cardiff players such as Lee Jarman and Damon Searle return to Ninian Park.

link_mentions.page: List of Cardiff City F.C. captains
response: |1997–1998 ||  || Dave Penney || Lee Jarman was captain whilst Penney was absent.
